msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Removing mobile-specific warnings for FXG features that were thought to have poor performance. The mobile team suggested they no longer need this as they don't use the GPU.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Updating FXGUtils to CT Yuki Branch 887174.
This is the final drop of FXGUtils from CT and future changes will be made directly to this SVN repository by the Flex SDK.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
- 2483956 (RadialGradientStrokes render differently between MXMLC runtime graphics and FXGUtils when there are default and some explicit parameters specified)
- 2483947 (The default Radial Gradient Stroke renders differently between runtime MXML and FXGUtils)
- 2480946 (FXGUtils doesn't correctly handle specification of explicit params of ScaleY and spreadMethod in conjunction with other defaults)
- 2483730 (Clipping doesn't appear to work correctly when the transformation is specified as a matrix.)
- 2481219 (FXGUtils doesn't correctly apply an elliptical clipping mask on a BitmapImage)
- 2481170 (A path with a default fillMode of  scale does not  fully fill the enclosing path)
- 2482234: Failures seen in MXMLC static compilation when fontFamily has been defined within .
- 2483627: FXGUtils does not raise an exception if definition name for a library element is the same as any existing tag name in FXG.
- 2485236: Stroke Path bounds appears to  be incorrect for alljointPathAndFXG.fxg as evidenced by running the test through SDK build 11894.
- 2486635, 2486636, 2486641, 2486645, 2486639, 2486570, 2486572, 2486567, 2486574, 2486581, 2486573: FXGUtils fails to catch an invalid value for the attribute of a boolean data type.
Also integrating several cyclone fixes after this changelist for:
- 2483956 (RadialGradientStrokes render differently between MXMLC runtime graphics and FXGUtils when there are default and some explicit parameters specified)
- 2483947 (The default Radial Gradient Stroke renders differently between runtime MXML and FXGUtils)
- 2480946 (FXGUtils doesn't correctly handle specification of explicit params of ScaleY and spreadMethod in conjunction with other defaults)
- 2483730 (Clipping doesn't appear to work correctly when the transformation is specified as a matrix.)
- 2481219 (FXGUtils doesn't correctly apply an elliptical clipping mask on a BitmapImage)
- 2481170 (A path with a default fillMode of  scale does not  fully fill the enclosing path)
- 2482234: Failures seen in MXMLC static compilation when fontFamily has been defined within .
- 2483627: FXGUtils does not raise an exception if definition name for a library element is the same as any existing tag name in FXG.
- 2485236: Stroke Path bounds appears to  be incorrect for alljointPathAndFXG.fxg as evidenced by running the test through SDK build 11894.
- 2486635, 2486636, 2486641, 2486645, 2486639, 2486570, 2486572, 2486567, 2486574, 2486581, 2486573: FXGUtils fails to catch an invalid value for the attribute of a boolean data type.
- 2487368(For bitmapfill fillMode=clip for a stroked path, if asserts are enabled, FXGUtils raises an Assertion error.)
- 236168 (Does not generate output for bitmap fill files that specify a matrix element.)
- 2489116: FXGUtils:NullPointer Exception occurred whild processing the group tag under library definition.
- 2486548: FXGUtils fails to raise an exception on a invalid specification of the color attribute in the <a> tag.
- 2486584: FXGUtils fails to report  invalid value of the color attribute within <tcy>.
- 2489103: FXGUtils:NumberFormat Exception occured while processing invalid color values.
- 2489137: FXGUtils raises a java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "ab"for an invalid fontSize type. It should be cast with a descriptive FXGException.
- 2489234: java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 0 raised when invalid color value is supplied to the tag.
QE notes: Yes, please investigate 1 mustella failure and 13 mxmlcunit failures from changes in error messages.
Tests run: Checkintests, mustella fxg, mxmlcunit fxg

Checking in Sujata's fix to FXGUtils for SDK which handles implicit close paths correctly.
QE notes: Please retest bug test case.
SDK-23093 - Unclosed path in static FXG displays with horizontal glitch
Tests run: Checkintests, Bug test case
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Updating FXGUtils to changelist 624084. This includes fixes to gradient transforms to conform to the updated FXG 2.0 specification.
Additionally applying Sujata's recent patch to FXGUtils to ensure a BitmapImage in a mask is rendered correctly. This addresses bug SDK-23807.
Removing empty FXG source folders from the swfutils module (FXG functionality is in the fxgutils module).
QE notes: Yes, please regenerate bitmaps for static FXG tests that use gradients.
SDK-23807 - [CT 2473048] Using a BitmapImage as a mask in static FXG does not work properly
Tests run: Checkintests, mustella fxg tests (72 tests need to be excluded)
